entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
